Summary: Bright object on Horizon, took pictures of object.
divs: Sighting DetailsI got these shots while my friend and I were coming down Sandia. Youll see inthe picture a plane smoke trail.. to the left of it is an object. At first wefigured it was a star, but after driving for about 10 minutes we could tell itwasnt because a cloud had moved from behind it, and stars cant have cloudsbehind them It may have been a chopper, it was relatively stationairy for thetime we watched it, I kept taking pictures until my batteries died from the restof the day. These were originally part of the November 2nd shots at the end ofthe day.
trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There were no other sightings in Albuquerque on or around November 2nd 2001
